data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carvalho, Thiago Ribeiro De, Giaretta, Ariovaldo Antonio, Magrini, Leandro (2012): A new species of the Bokermannohyla circumdata group (Anura: Hylidae) from southeastern Brazil, with bioacoustic data on seven species of the genus. Zootaxa 3321: 37-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214864
